title: The Cave Of Wisdom: Cave of Wisdom: Finest of Esoteric & Semitic Philosophy, part 2
description: This Book is the Eversion of my paperback book The Cave Of Wisdom. The paper back book has 725 pages, so i have decided to make this Eversion in three parts for easy reading. This book is the Second version. It contains the gist of mystical teachings from Esoteric Eastern Philosophy and is also blended finely with the very essence of Semitic philosophy that is spread through Christianity, Islam and Judaism. The book has extensive quotes and stories said by various masters like Sri Ramakrishna Paramahamsa, Swami Vivekananda, Ramana Maharishi, Zen and Tao Masters. The book also contains many Upanishad mantras translated by the author. The principal ideologies in Upanishad are mostly discussed in the book.
author: Rajesh Nanoo
